description: Documentation for 9.7.16.10.7. Block Scaling for tcgen05.mma.sync

directories.name: 97161072_scale_factor_a_id
directories.description: The value of the scale factor `A ID` selects the sub-columns in the Tensor Memory to form the scale factor `A` matrix, which is used to scale the matrix `A`.

directories.name: 97161073_scale_factor_b_id
directories.description: The value of the scale factor `B ID` selects the sub-columns in the Tensor Memory to form the scale factor `B` matrix, which is used to scale the matrix `B`.

files.title: Overview
files.summary: The `tcgen05.mma` instructions with the following `.kind` qualifier:

files.title: 9.7.16.10.7.1. Valid combinations of scale_vectorsize with types and MMA-Kind
files.summary: The shape of *scale\_A* and *scale\_B* matrices depend on the `.scale_vectorsize` as shown in [Table 56](https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/parallel-thread-execution/#tcgen05-mma-scale-valid-comb).
